shorts.title: Maeda takes no-hitter bid into 8th, RailRiders win fifth straight road game
shorts.title_distilled: Maeda takes no-hitter bid into 8th, RailRiders win fifth straight road game.
shorts.description: Kenta Maeda tossed seven and two-thirds innings of no-hit ball, striking out nine, to lead the Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders past the Worcester Red Sox, 5-1, on Wednesday at Polar Park for their fifth straight road victory. After a second inning walk, the 37-year-old retired 19 straight batters, throwing no more than 14 pitches in any inning. After striking out the first two batters in the eighth, Nathan Hickey ripped Maeda’s 3-1 pitch over the wall in right field, breaking up the bid as well as the shutout. It was Hickey’s 14th home run of the season. Maeda (5-6) threw 65 of his 100 […]
shorts.content: Kenta Maeda tossed seven and two-thirds innings of no-hit ball, striking out nine, to lead the Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders past the Worcester Red Sox, 5-1, on Wednesday at Polar Park for their fifth straight road victory. After a second inning walk, the 37-year-old retired 19 straight batters, throwing no more than 14 pitches in any inning. After striking out the first two batters in the eighth, Nathan Hickey ripped Maeda’s 3-1 pitch over the wall in right field, breaking up the bid as well as the shutout. It was Hickey’s 14th home run of the season. Maeda (5-6) threw 65 of his 100 […]
shorts.content_distilled: Kenta Maeda tossed seven and two-thirds innings of no-hit ball, striking out nine, to lead the Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders past the Worcester Red Sox, 5-1, on Wednesday at Polar Park for their fifth straight road victory.

shorts.title: HS ROUNDUP: Revello lifts Old Forge over Holy Cross in golf
shorts.title_distilled: HS ROUNDUP: Revello lifts Old Forge over Holy Cross in golf.
shorts.description: Joey Revello shot a 38 as Old Forge edged Holy Cross, 164-167, in a Lackawanna League Division II boys golf match Wednesday at Pine Hills. Ryan DeMarco added a 40 for the Blue Devils, while Camren Krushnowski shot a 41. Joseph Yusinski and Josh Toolan each shot a 41 for the Crusaders. Old Forge: Revello 38, DeMarco 40, Krushnowski 41, Kupetz 45; Holy Cross: Yusinski 41, Toolan 41, Moran 42, Bohanski 43; Records: OF 3-8, HC 4-6. shorts.title: Putting down roots: The Vinery Plant Co. opens on Main Street in Carbondale
shorts.title_distilled: Putting down roots: The Vinery Plant Co.
shorts.description: Main Street in Carbondale has gotten a little greener over the past few months. The Vinery Plant Co. set its roots down in Carbondale in June, the physical manifestation of a passionate hobby that owner Ali Freno developed in college involving houseplants.
shorts.content: Main Street in Carbondale has gotten a little greener over the past few months. The Vinery Plant Co. set its roots down in Carbondale in June, the physical manifestation of a passionate hobby that owner Ali Freno developed in college involving houseplants.

shorts.title: Community Calendar 9/4/25
shorts.description: CHURCH NOTES All Saints Orthodox Church: 211 Willow Ave., Olyphant, offers a frozen pierogi sale from 9 to 11 a.m. every Friday and 10:30 a.m. to noon every Sunday in the church basement. Christ Episcopal Church: 700 Delaware and Dundaff streets, Forest City, will host its community luncheon Sept. 20. Serving will begin at noon and end at 1 p.m. All are welcome. Rescue & Restore Church: Members of the church at 120 Willow Ave. in Olyphant, the former Holy Ghost Parish, residents of the Valley, veterans or anyone wishing to support the church may preserve their family name or […]

shorts.title: WWII Navy sailor Jerome Mullaney laid to rest in Scranton 81 years after D-Day
shorts.title_distilled: WWII Navy sailor Jerome Mullaney laid to rest in Scranton 81 years after D-Day.
shorts.description: Jerome Mullaney's remains were identified earlier this year through DNA testing, allowing his family and the military to finally lay him to rest.
